text:
On Sigma Xi’s blog, @SigmaXiCEO discusses the news of the first non-clinical trial subject in the U.S. receiving the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 and the years of medical advancements that made it possible. 

READ MORE: https://t.co/gCisaZxSh7 #vaccine #COVID19 https://t.co/z293gAXm8E
